name: wood-hammer
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.
